author: Brian Holcomb
title: EmpireCLS Brings On Travel Industry Veteran Gary Stevens as Executive Director, Sales & Marketing
text:
EmpireCLS Worldwide Chauffeured Services announced today the company has appointed travel industry veteran Gary Stevens as Executive Director, Sales & Marketing. In his new role, Stevens will be responsible for building upon and further cultivating the company’s sales and marketing partnerships within the travel industry, as well as developing other business opportunities and markets globally.
“We are very excited to have Gary onboard,” said EmpireCLS chairman and CEO David Seelinger. “He brings with him a wealth of talent, and his dynamic industry background will be impactful as we continue to grow and expand our relationships and partnerships within the travel community and beyond.”
With a travel career spanning 30 years, and specializing in the luxury marketplace, Stevens has spearheaded and managed leisure sales, operations and marketing for leading travel agencies on both coasts, including Leaders In Travel, Ltd., Ultramar Travel Management, Plaza Travel and The Lawyer’s Travel Service. Stevens launched the original, acclaimed Giants Select marketing program for the cooperative, GIANTS (now Ensemble Travel Group), as well as the creative marketing for the Uniglobe CruiseCenters franchise.
About EmpireCLS:
Founded in 1980, Empire International launched what would become the industry standard for worldwide ground transportation service. Founded in 1981, CLS Worldwide Chauffeured Services became the premier car service for CEOs and the entertainment and media elite in Hollywood and Beverly Hills. The companies merged in 2005 to form EmpireCLS, sharing a vision for world-class, executive travel services through luxury, privacy, and personalization. Available in over 700 cities globally, EmpireCLS’s approach to ground transportation is sought after by CEOs, dignitaries, executives and entertainers around the world. Recently, EmpireCLS was recognized by the New York City concierge community for outstanding chauffeured service and was awarded the 2015 Concierge Choice Award for “Best Limousine Service.” For more information, visit empirecls.com and our Facebook , Twitter and Instagram pages.
